duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform diagnostic procedures using ultrasound waves to examine tissue and body structure, providing quality images for interpretation.
Set up and adjust all equipment, and maneuver transducers to perform exams with safety and quality control procedures.
Recognize significant structures, artifacts, pathology, and equipment limitations during imaging procedures.
Ensure the prompt submission of high-quality images and documents to PACS, and maintain compliance with regulatory agencies.
Assist in maintaining a clean and orderly department, including procedure rooms and storage areas.
Work in a constant state of alertness and safe manner, and perform other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree or completion of a Sonography certification program
